name: Pointless - SOTWS - Lawman of Sweet Breeze

description:
COPPER SILVER PARTY MEMBER MOD

Starting off as an entry for Dirge's SOTWS character contest, and made fully into a mod with my help, we're proud to present Lawman of Sweet Breeze!
